headline: Lockheed Q2 Earnings on the Horizon: Buy or Sell Ahead of Results?
summary: LMT's Q2 sales are likely to have risen across all segments, but dismal earnings expectations and weak price performance raise caution.

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock that Should Get More Attention and 2 to Avoid
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.

headline: Jim Cramer on Huntington Ingalls: “I Think It’s a Buy”
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (NYSE:HII) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s spotlight. During the lightning round, a caller asked about the company, and Cramer stated: “I’ve liked it since it was spun off… I think it’s terrific.
